actor_awards.notes: Born in China to missionary parents, she is best known for her iconic role as Alice Kramden on 'The Honeymooners', for which she won a Primetime Emmy. She was the sister of actress Jayne Meadows.

filmography.title: That Touch of Mink
filmography.role_description: The cynical and protective roommate of the protagonist, offering advice on how to handle wealthy men.
filmography.plot: A wealthy businessman courts a working-class woman with a proposal that doesn't include marriage, while her roommate warns her of his intentions.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Motion Picture - Comedy

filmography.title: Take Her, She's Mine
filmography.role_description: The supportive wife of a protective father who is trying to cope with his daughter going away to college.
filmography.plot: A lawyer tries to protect his teenage daughter from the perceived dangers of college life and studying abroad.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actor (James Stewart)

filmography.title: Rosie!
filmography.role_description: One of the greedy daughters who tries to have her wealthy, eccentric mother declared incompetent.
filmography.plot: A wealthy widow's daughters try to have her declared insane to get control of her money, but she fights back with the help of her lawyer.

filmography.title: The Revenge of the Stepford Wives
filmography.role_description: A resident of Stepford who helps the new protagonist uncover the town's sinister secret. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: A reporter arrives in Stepford and discovers that the town's women are being replaced by robots.

filmography.title: Sammy, the Way-Out Seal
filmography.role_description: The mother of two boys who secretly bring a seal home from their summer vacation. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: Two brothers find a seal and try to keep it as a pet in their home without their parents finding out.

filmography.title: Invisible Strangler
filmography.role_description: A character in this horror thriller about an escaped convict who uses invisibility to kill.
filmography.plot: A murderer studies the paranormal in prison and learns how to become invisible to escape and terrorize five women.

filmography.title: Visit to a Chief's Son
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in this family adventure film set in Africa.
filmography.plot: An American anthropologist takes his son on an expedition to Africa, where the boy befriends the son of a Masai chief.

filmography.title: Alice in Wonderland
filmography.role_description: A character who participates in the Caucus Race in this TV adaptation.
filmography.plot: Alice falls down a rabbit hole into a fantasy world populated by peculiar anthropomorphic creatures.

filmography.title: A Wedding on Walton's Mountain
filmography.role_description: A character in this television movie continuation of 'The Waltons'.
filmography.plot: Erin Walton plans to marry her boyfriend, but her old boyfriend returns to town.

filmography.title: Red Skelton's Christmas Dinner
filmography.role_description: The mother character in this holiday special featuring Red Skelton's classic characters.
filmography.plot: Freddie the Freeloader finds a lost dog and tries to help it during Christmas.

filmography.title: Lily: Sold Out
filmography.role_description: Lily Tomlin's stage mother in this comedy special.
filmography.plot: Comedian Lily Tomlin plays two characters, herself and her stage mother, as she prepares for a show in Las Vegas.
filmography.awards: Primetime Emmy: Win – Outstanding Variety, Music or Comedy Program
